detailedProducts.name: Big Beef Burrito
detailedProducts.description: A hearty burrito stuffed with seasoned beef, rice, beans, and melted cheese, wrapped in a warm tortilla.

detailedProducts.name: Chicken Wrap
detailedProducts.description: Tender grilled chicken with lettuce, tomato, and creamy sauce, rolled in a soft tortilla.

detailedProducts.name: Margherita Magic
detailedProducts.description: Classic Margherita pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves for a pure Italian taste.

detailedProducts.name: Veggie Delight
detailedProducts.description: A colorful mix of bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms topped on a cheese-rich pizza base.

detailedProducts.name: Vegier Burger
detailedProducts.description: A crispy veggie patty with lettuce, tomato, and tangy sauce served in a soft sesame bun.

detailedProducts.name: Wendy Burger
detailedProducts.description: Juicy beef patty layered with cheddar cheese, pickles, and house sauce on a toasted bun.
